oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bill Monroe and Alison Krauss (proof)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Color separation; Krauss, Alison, 1971-; Metal photoplates; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (blue on white) announcing Bluegrass Night with Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys and Alison Krauss in concert on June 14. The poster features the first application of color in what would have been a two color card. The poster contains a metal photoplate of Bill Monroe and is probably a proof.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: posters; proofs (prints by function); window cards;
